name: Ramon Lopez
text: Amazing Sunday Crew! Sorry we have people in this world who are rude and don‚Äôt know Patience! To the manager/employee you handled it with grace and humility! It‚Äôs 2020 guys let‚Äôs be kinder to each other and spread PEACE AND LOVE! Other than that my pizza was fire üî•

name: Wayne Hui
text: Food is good here as always. They serve mostly thin crust pizza w fresh tasting ingredients. I used their app to order while sitting outside to pickup. In retrospect, I should just have walked in to order and pickup. It took 2x as long ‚Ä¶More

text: I love the dough in this pizza place. Everything looks and taste super fresh. The people working there were very friendly. The passion fruit juice needed some more flavor, maybe to much water. The smores are great

name: Walter van Dusen
text: First time we heard of Blaze Pizza was in Nashua NH when we dined at one in the mall. Glad we have one local too. Love the concept of choosing the items from the amazing selection. My wife and I went for the high rise crust. Hers was a ‚Ä¶More

name: Jin Song
text: Great friendly employees and appreciated that everyone was taking Covid precautions seriously.

name: Mackenzie Schoenthaler
text: Good food but more importantly excellent service. Jasin was phenomenal, helpful, totally down to work with a new customer to create a dope pizza, and clearly super skilled at making pizza. Thanks for dousing my pizza w pesto

name: lee violetfun
text: They are able to bake the pizza crispy and yet soft on the top. I think they are really doing a good job. Much better pizza than many famous pizza places. With about 10$ for build you own pizza, really worth it.

name: Cassandra Richeson
text: So good and the employees were so patient with us (it was our first time)! We will definitely be back.

name: Madeline Coats
text: I have to mention the staff members at this location, they were SO wonderful! Welcoming, helpful, kind, friendly, etc. I‚Äôm so impressed. I was also pleased with my salad, but, I can‚Äôt wait to go back here and be served by their staff again. Great!!

name: Srinisha Jayaseelan
text: Had a extrodinary experience eating my pizza over there, great staff and amazing customer service especially a lovely young lady called Anna , she is always helpful and professional with the team  .Would defintely reccomend anyone craving a pizza to check it out.

name: Harry
text: Outdoor seating available, love the make your own pizza option, less cheese more veggies üëç

text: Good pizza sauce is a bit spicy for my taste

text: Blaze Pizza is one of my favorite pizza places, high quality and you get what you want

name: Matt H

text: Great lunch pizza place! I really like the build your own pizza option and the ready to order pizza types have good variety too. ‚Ä¶More

name: Collin Tsui
text: Best service of any Blaze restaurant we've been to!

name: Peter Sward
text: I love their pizza especially for the thin crust. The pizza is cooked perfectly every time. I also love that you can add toppings as the pizza moves along and there is no extra charge for anything. Adding some olive oil and arugula at the end doesn't hurt either. Did I mention that the pizza cooks blazingly fast?

name: Ashley Mannisto
text: Pizza was so good! My son recently has gone on a Gluten free diet due to come health problems. The workers here were amazing with taking it serious, changing their gloves and making sure to use the sauce that hadn't touched the regular ‚Ä¶More

name: Al lee
text: Didn't get my pizza as ordered, none of the "finishes" were there.  Pizza was ok

name: Chef Lynne Howell
text: Brilliant concept!!  I want to buy stock in this company!! Staff is super friendly! The pizza choices are delicious and fresh..the crust is divine...cooked so fast...all the right drizzle toppings too!! I really loved it ! I always have a ‚Ä¶More

name: Andy G
text: Food was delicious. Employees were friendly and service was fast. Didn't cost too much either. What more can you ask for? Great place!

name: Sina Razzaghi
text:
This place is amazing! The employees are very nice and kind. They treat you as a guest not just a customer.
We walked in at 9:55 and asked them if they make us pizzas. The guy put ‚Ä¶More

name: Karen Perriello
text: Delicious and love the keto-friendly crust!

name: Kunal Dalwadi
text: Best pizza for the buck. A must visit place for pizza lovers and multi - topping lovers. Even if you wanna grab a quick bite it serves you well. Very friendly and helping staff.

name: Lorin DeBellis
text: It's great to see another Blaze Pizza open up in the area. It's the same menu as other locations where you can select from their pre-crafted pizzas or build your own. At about $9 a pizza and their 180 second cook time, it's a great place to go for a quick meal.

name: Crisdelin Calduch
text: Horrible place to work in !!! The owner needs some education him self

name: John Diaz
text: Horrible management, went there and they burnt the heck out of my pizzas and when I asked to have them replaced them they refused to do so. I called corporate for health safety code violations after seeing a mouse running around the restaurant.

name: KT Tran
text: Can never go wrong with making your own, which I always do whenever I go to Blaze.

name: U G
text: Staff was not that friendly and didn‚Äôt accept my coupon :-(

name: Akshat Sanghvi
text:
Quick service.
Extra care taken for every instruction I have ever given. (new cutter/only veggies/no meat strictly) ‚Ä¶More

name: Carolyn Young
text: Fresh ingredients, made to order, reasonably priced and prompt. Crust unremarkable bordering on fair.  The knots were tasty.  Cheese was heavy, toppings sparse.  Acceptable for a quick fix, not a destination. Staff great, but doesn't compensate for the mediocrity of the food.

name: ian carpenter
text: The food itself was good but overall I was disappointed as it seemed like a good idea but in practice it was inefficient. You make a selection and follow your pizza through the human conveyor system but they kept asking again what we ‚Ä¶More

name: brian connearney
text: Great service. A good place to bring the kids and let them make their own pizza.

name: Damien Southwell
text: Amazing pizza, great staff!

name: Rebecca Turkmen
text: Love brick oven pizza!!

name: J Maag
text: I love the concept and the food is amazing! The  people making the pizza some times skimp on the toppings but I just make sure to ask for more of whatever I want. We love going here!

name: Alyssa Arsenault
text: I love Blaze pizza! I'd give it five stars if the quality/accuracy of my orders were a little more consistent, but aside from that it's great. Fresh food & great options.

name: Stephanie McCullough
text: I thoroughly enjoy the food here! It's a make your own personal pizza quick serve restaurant. For $9.95, you can literally put any and all toppings on your pizza! They carry a large selection of toppings, cheeses, and sauces. There are ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeff Laurenza
text: Great thin crust pizza. Their signature pizzas are excellent or you can make your own choosing from over 20 fresh  toppings, and flavored sauces. The tomato sauce has a nice pizza sauce sweetness. The crust fires up nice and crispy in hot ‚Ä¶More

name: E. M.
text: Best pizza! Where else can you get a Build Your Own pizza with unlimited toppings, for about $7!? Fresh, hot out of the oven. This is the only pizza place we go to!

name: Jason Taylor
text: They need to learn from the Cambridge store. No communication between employees,  totally discombobulated.  Been coming since this location opened hoping that they got the management part down, and unfortunately still not.  No one seems to ‚Ä¶More

name: Ralph Dasilva
text: It's just ok to me. Not a big fan of the crust as I have been to other pizza places with better tasting thin crust. I do like the ideas of you picking out the toppings for the pizza. Big big fan of the brick ovens

name: Matt Valuk
text: Love it!  It gives us flexibility with pizza. My wife and son want cheese, which is fine. However I'm a bit more adventurous with my pizza choices. I love the BBQ chicken pizza it's pretty much perfect.  The prices are super reasonable and I really enjoy the fresh lemonade.

name: Christopher St. Yves
text: This place was a pleasant surprise. You build your own pizza like you would a sandwich at Subway. I've yet to concoct a pizza that I didn't enjoy. The size of the pizzas are just right, too. As in, I don't hate myself afterward for eating a whole one. The parking can be really tight though. Not really their fault.

name: Nicholas Wong
text:
Not the best pizza in the world, but good for a quick fix and better than the other chain delivery places.
They're all made to order and the ingredients look fresh. ‚Ä¶More

name: Corey Winney
text: It's like Chipotle for pizza. It's amazing! You can build your own pizza or choose from their menu. They put the pizza together for you right there and then throw it in the oven. I thought the wait would be a lot longer but before I knew it my pizza was done. Would definitely go there again.

name: Komal S
text: Nice variety of pizzas in menu. Not only that, you can customize your pizza however you like with unlimited toppings. I love that they've garlic and spicy tomato sauce!

name: Nancy Gouveia
text: I love Blaze Pizza!  All of our favorite toppings, fast and everyone gets just what they want!  Try the "build your own" to choose as many delicious toppings as you like.

name: Sandra Verrier
text: Not impressed, could have done the same with a pizza machine (no staff) although the staff was the best part of the restaurant because they were friendly and helpful in answering all our questions and it looked like they were having fun. I ‚Ä¶More

name: Rachael Rigoli
text: Wicked good food and wicked nice workers

name: Rebecca Niver
text: Such a fun way to grab some pizza! Love the pizzas they create (green stripe is my favorite) and they have tons of options for customization too! Their root beer is also so so tasty- definitely give it a try!

name: Shree Harlalka
text: I had experienced a similar concept in LA a while back and was our go to place for lunch. This place did not disappoint, fresh ingredients, perfectly baked crust and quick ready meal - recipe for success.

name: Katie
text: Love the concept of this place. It's like subway for pizza but better. Definitely going back. Pizza was great and staff was friendly  Food was ready extremely quick.

name: Nexus Rit
text: Awesome Pizza. Loved It

name: Jeetu P
text: Chipotle for Pizza. Price, Ambience, Service all great. Restroom is clean. Quick eat if going there for lunch. Good for groups and family. Parking is available.

name: Roxane Balwin
text: Friendly workers, clean and fast. We went in to try the keto crust.  It was good and would stop again for it.

name: Peter M.
text: A carbon copy of west coast places like MOD pizza, but this is done really well, the pies are fast fired in a open oven. The production area and staff are always on point, I have not had a bad experience here, The build your own High rise ‚Ä¶More

text: Amazing fresh ingredients. Gourmet quality  pizza made fresh in minutes.  Choose crust type,  sauce type, cheese blends and toppings... by the hundreds!  Woman in charge was amazing... had everything running smoothly!  Sign said 1,2 or 3 ‚Ä¶More

name: Sally Willard
text: Ordered online. Pizza was ready when I got there. It was hot and very tasty. For the price and flavor, Blaze is a deal.

name: Andrew Gallant
text: Pizza and dough knots are pretty good here. The have lots of customization options for sauces, cheeses, and toppings. Pricing is higher than your typical pizza shop, but you get what you pay for at Blaze.

name: Nicole Bennett
text: The food is good and is ready quickly but it seems like every time I go, the entire staff is new except for one person.

name: TechDebt
text: Consistent quality of ingredients and process, great price, speed. Great for an impromptu family dinner with kids.

name: Brandon Smith
text: This particular Blaze location is abysmal. I have been there 4 or 5 times in the 6 months I've worked in this area, and have run into issues all but one time. ‚Ä¶More

text: Expensive and flavorless pizza and they're skimpy with the toppings. Will not be back.

name: Kelly Michael Skelton
text: Great vibe, tasty pizza, good service. Very nice spot for a bite!

name: Dennis Rogers
text: It's personal pizza served quickly. It seems like it's hard to get the timing right on how long they keep the pizzas in the oven. I've had pies that are cooked perfectly, but others that are definitely undercooked.

name: Dave Schwabauer
text: We were the first ones in the door. What a great place! You work with the counter staff to either make a menu pizza, or build one of your own. Very tasty and fairly quick. I know this is a chsin, but for pizza lovers who like to dabble in their own creation this place is highly recommended.

name: Mark Stacy
text: Fast pizza. Good pizza. "Pure ingredients." I enjoyed the single serving pizza, especially the fresh tomato halves.

name: Heather Dely
text: My daughter got a coupon on a field trip and honestly the woman behind the counter made it so I will be back.  She guessed how to spell my daughters name and came real close, but was super sweet to my shy girl who I am teaching how to be more independent.  She made it easy and a great experience

text: Really great pizza, but busy during lunch time. Definitely order ahead and pick up if possible!

text: Great food at a great price. Staff was super nice. We'll be back!

text: If you like pizza it's a good place to go. I like making a custom order and having it come out quickly.

text: Awesome Pizza, it's thin because it's flamed but even if you normally don't like thin pizza you'll probably like this. Great environment and the wait time is super short and adding the toppings is like going to subway.

name: Donald Tanguay
text: Fresh ingredients and fresh pizza made-to-order. What else do you need? Although the menu shows just a few combinations in unusual terminology, you can piece together any combination of "pie" you like. One special offering they have is the agua fresca. Every flavor of agua fresca I've tried has been creative and delicious.

name: LG
text: I work close by and was looking for take-out; I downloaded the menu and realized there was no pricing. Who would order anything without knowing the price? Guess I will move on to the next place. Please update your menu with pricing.
